Package model.solver

Class Solver

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.solver.Solver

  • public class Solver
extends java.lang.Object
    Solver's class

    The Solver class represents the AI code. It is used to solve the board by itself.

    See Also:
    Board, Node

        Method searching the path from startNode to goalNode

      • constructPath

        private java.util.List<Node> constructPath​(Node start,
                                           Node end)
        Construct the path from a node to another.

        What it does is rolling up the parent nodes and adding it to the path.

        Parameters:
        start - starting node
        end - ending node
        Returns:
        a list of Nodes as path
